column2: "Wɔmma dodow a wɔwɔ kɔndua ase dɛ nkowaa mbu hɔn wuranom dɛ wɔsɛ enyidzi nyina
column3: na Nyankopɔn dzin nye nkyerɛkyerɛ no wɔaannkasa ho bɔn."
mma wommbu hɔn enyimtsia dɛ wɔyɛ enuanom ntsi; na mbom wɔnsom hɔn yie
column4: osiandɛ hɔn a woenya adɔyɛ no bi no
column5: wɔyɛ agyedzifo nye adɔfo. Iyinom na kyerɛkyerɛ na tu ho fo."

column3: na ɔammpen hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest nsɛm a oye no nye nkyerɛkyerɛ no a ɔdze kɔ nyamesompa mu no a
column7: na mbom ɔyar ekyingye nye nokotwa a dza ofi mu ba nye nyitan
column12: "ɔham a ɔsɛ nyimpa a wɔaprɔw adwen mu
column14: wosusu dɛ nyamesompa yɛ adzepɛ kwan."

column2: "Na nyamesompa a abodwee ka ho yɛ adzenya kɛse;"

column3: eso yerunntum mmfa hwee mmfi mu nnkɔ;"

column2: "na sɛ yɛwɔ edziban nye akataho a
column3: hom mma ɔnoara ndɔɔ hɛn so."

column2: "Na mbom hɔn a wɔrepɛ ayɛ ahonyafo no
column3: wɔhwe nsɔhwɛ nye efir nye nkwasea akɔndɔ pii a ɔyɛ mbusu a ɔtwe hɔn kogu ɔsɛɛ nye ɔhera mu."

column2: "Na sikapɛ mbordo nye bɔn horow nyina no ndwow a binom edzi ekyir atɔ gon efi gyedzi no ho
column3: na wɔdze yaw pii awowɔ hɔnho."

column4: guan fi yinom ho; na dzi tsenenee

column3: suo onnyiewiei nkwa a wɔbɔɔ dzin frɛɛ wo a idzii ho dase pa no wɔ adasefo pii enyim no mu."

column2: "Mutu wo fo wɔ Nyankopɔn a ɔma ndzɛmba nyina nkwa
column3: nye Kraest Jesus a odzii dase pa no wɔ Pontius Pilate enyim no enyim
column6: mma dzɛm anaa fɛr bi mmba wo ho ma onkesi dɛ hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest beyi noho akyerɛ:"

column3: ɔno a ɔyɛ Otumfo siarfo kortsee

column2: "onyia a no nko wɔ bɛkyebo nkwa
column3: na ɔtse kan a wɔbɛn ho a ɔnnyɛ yie mu; nyia nyimpa biara nnhun no da
column4: na wonnkotum so ehu no da; ɔno na enyidzi nye daa tum a ɔmmbɔ adze da nyɛ nedze afebɔɔ. Amen."

column2: "Kasa kyerɛ hɔn a wɔyɛ ahonyafo wɔ sesei wiadze yi mu dɛ
column4: eso mma wɔmmfa hɔn enyi nnto ahonyadze a onnsi pi no do
column5: na mbom wɔmfa nto Nyankopɔn a ɔma hɛn adze nyina pii dɛ yendzi no do;"

column3: dɛ wɔnyɛ ahonyafo wɔ ndwuma pa mu

column2: "na wɔmfa nhyehyɛ fapem pa nto hɔ mma hɔnho nsie ndaamba
column3: ama woeesuo nkwa a ɔyɛ nokwar nkwa no mu."
kora dza wɔdze ahyɛ wo nsa no
column5: nye nokotwa a wɔfom frɛ no nyimdzee no ho."

column2: "Ɔno na binom dween dɛ hɔn nsa aka ma wɔayew efi gyedzi kwan no ho no. Adom nka hom."
